name: sfmovies
description: A RESTful API for movies filmed in San Francisco
author: Zac Leids

scripts.release:patch: changelog -p && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --new-version patch && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:minor: changelog -m && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --new-version minor && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.release:major: changelog -M && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit -m 'updated CHANGELOG.md' && yarn version --new-version major && git push origin && git push origin --tags
scripts.db:reset: if [ "$NODE_ENV" != "production" ]; then dropdb $(node -p "require('./config').DB_NAME"); yarn run db:setup && yarn run db:migrate; fi
scripts.db:setup: if [ "$NODE_ENV" != "production" ]; then createdb -O $(node -e "var c = require('./config'); console.log(c.DB_USER, c.DB_NAME);"); fi
